children.docstring: - Allow empty lists as header values

children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Add `Utils::redactUserInfo()` method - Add ability to encode bools as ints in `Query::build`

children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - PHP 8.4 support
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Fixed another issue with the fact that PHP transforms numeric strings in array keys to ints
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Updated links in docs to their canonical versions - Replaced `call_user_func*` with native calls
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Properly handle the fact that PHP transforms numeric strings in array keys to ints
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Updated the mime type map to add some new entries, fix a couple of invalid entries, and remove an invalid entry - Fallback to `application/octet-str
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Corrected mime type for `.acc` files to `audio/aac`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - PHP 8.3 support
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Adjusted `psr/http-message` version constraint to `^1.1 || ^2.0`
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Prevent possible warnings on unset variables in `ServerRequest::normalizeNestedFileSpec` - Fixed `Message::bodySummary` when `preg_match` fails - Fi
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Removed the need for `AllowDynamicProperties` in `LazyOpenStream`
children.name: Changed

children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Fixed erroneous behaviour when combining host and relative path

children.docstring: - Rewind body before reading in `Message::bodySummary`

children.docstring: - Added provisional PHP 8.2 support - Added `UriComparator::isCrossOrigin` method
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Added `Header::splitList` method - Added `Utils::tryGetContents` method - Improved `Stream::getContents` method - Updated mimetype mappings
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Fix `Message::parseRequestUri` for numeric headers - Re-wrap exceptions thrown in `fread` into runtime exceptions - Throw an exception when multipar
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Correct header value validation
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - A more compressive list of mime types - Add JsonSerializable to Uri - Missing return types
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Bug MultipartStream no `uri` metadata - Bug MultipartStream with filename for `data://` streams - Fixed new line handling in MultipartStream - Reduc
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Validate header values properly
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Attempting to create a `Uri` object from a malformed URI will no longer throw a generic `InvalidArgumentException`, but rather a `MalformedUriExcept
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Return `null` in caching stream size if remote size is `null`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Handle possibly unset `url` in `stream_get_meta_data`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - PSR-17 factories - Made classes final - PHP7 type hints
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - When building a query string, booleans are represented as 1 and 0.
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - PHP < 7.2 support - All functions in the `GuzzleHttp\Psr7` namespace
children.name: Removed

children.docstring: - Issue parsing IPv6 URLs - Issue modifying ServerRequest lost all its attributes
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Locale independent URL parsing - Most classes got a `@final` annotation to prepare for 2.0
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Issue when creating stream from `php://input` and curl-ext is not installed - Broken `Utils::tryFopen()` on PHP 8
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Replaced functions by static methods
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Converting a non-seekable stream to a string - Handle multiple Set-Cookie correctly - Ignore array keys in header values when merging - Allow multib
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Restored partial HHVM 3 support
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Accept null and bool header values again
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Allowed version `^3.0` of `ralouphie/getallheaders` dependency (#244) - Added MIME type for WEBP image format (#246) - Added more validation of valu
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Tests don't pass with HHVM 4.0, so HHVM support got dropped. Other libraries like composer have done the same. (#262) - Accept port number 0 to be v
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Fixed subsequent reads from `php://input` in ServerRequest (#247) - Fixed readable/writable detection for certain stream modes (#248) - Fixed encodi
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Check body size when getting the message summary
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Get the summary of a body only if it is readable
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Response first-line to response string exception (fixes #145) - A test for #129 behavior - `get_message_body_summary` function in order to get the m
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Clarify exception message when stream is detached
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - Deprecated parsing folded header lines as per RFC 7230
children.name: Deprecated

children.docstring: - Fix `AppendStream::detach` to not close streams - `InflateStream` preserves `isSeekable` attribute of the underlying stream - `ServerRequest::getUri
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Reverted BC break to `Uri::resolve` and `Uri::removeDotSegments` by removing calls to `trigger_error` when deprecated methods are invoked.
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Rriggering of silenced deprecation warnings.
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Reverted BC break by reintroducing behavior to automagically fix a URI with a relative path and an authority by adding a leading slash to the path.
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Added common URI utility methods based on RFC 3986 (see documentation in the readme): - `Uri::isDefaultPort` - `Uri::isAbsolute` - `Uri::isNetworkPa
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Ensure `ServerRequest::getUriFromGlobals` returns a URI in absolute form. - Allow `parse_response` to parse a response without delimiting space and
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - `Uri::resolve` in favor of `UriResolver::resolve` - `Uri::removeDotSegments` in favor of `UriResolver::removeDotSegments`
children.name: Deprecated

children.docstring: - `Stream::read` when length parameter <= 0. - `copy_to_stream` reads bytes in chunks instead of `maxLen` into memory. - `ServerRequest::getUriFromGlo
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - `Uri::__toString` for network path references, e.g. `//example.org`. - Missing lowercase normalization for host. - Handling of URI components in cas
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Remaining interfaces needed for full PSR7 compatibility (ServerRequestInterface, UploadedFileInterface, etc.). - Support for stream_for from scalars
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Can now extend Uri.
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - A bug in validating request methods by making it more permissive.
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Support in `GuzzleHttp\Psr7\CachingStream` for seeking forward on remote streams, which can sometimes return fewer bytes than requested with `fread`
children.name: Fixed

children.docstring: - Support for URIs without any authority. - Support for HTTP 451 'Unavailable For Legal Reasons.' - Support for using '0' as a filename. - Support for
children.name: Added

children.docstring: - Now supporting negative offsets when seeking to SEEK_END.
children.name: Changes

children.docstring: - Body as `"0"` is now properly added to a response. - Now allowing forward seeking in CachingStream. - Now properly parsing HTTP requests that contai
children.name: Changed

children.docstring: - URIs can now be relative. - `multipart/form-data` headers are now overridden case-insensitively. - URI paths no longer encode the following characte
children.name: Changed

symbols.name: CachingStream

symbols.name: Implementing stream decorators
